definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: ‘son’ of Cush, [[הָ֠]] Ge 10:7, Ge 10:7 = [[אָ֠]] 1Ch 1:9, 1Ch 1:9 (Baer, v. his note; van d. H. Gi [[הָ֠]] v:b); Regxma, Regma; [[הָ֠]] as trading people Ez Eze 27:22, Rama, Ragma. Identified by many with city (Reg(a)ma (Ptol:vi. 7, 14), (Rhgma (Steph. Byz.), in SE. Arabia, on Pers. Gulf (so even DHM:ZMG xxx (1876), 122 Glas:Skizze ii.251, 325), but this is rjmh: in inscr. (Glas:ib. 252); <Sab. [[רעַמה]] near Me‘în in SW. Arabia (Hom:Südar. Chr. 131 Hal:535, 11, cf. DHM:l. c.), perh. = (Rammani=tai of Strabo:xvi. 4. 24, v. Di:Ge 10:7.
